summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Othello Street, from 12th Avenue Southwest to 16th Avenue Southwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9085 9085 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
